list.name: team_id
list.label: Team
list.query: SELECT id AS __value, name AS __text FROM teams UNION ALL SELECT 'unassigned' AS __value, 'Unassigned' AS __text ORDER BY __text

panels.title: After-hours Commit Ratio (Weekdays)
panels.description: Commits outside BUSINESS_HOURS_START/BUSINESS_HOURS_END in BUSINESS_TIMEZONE (weekdays only).

targets.rawSql: SELECT day AS time, ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned') AS metric, argMax(after_hours_commit_ratio, computed_at) AS value FROM team_metrics_daily WHERE match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day, metric ORDER BY day

panels.title: Weekend Commit Ratio (Weekly)
panels.description: Weekend commits / total commits, grouped by week.

targets.rawSql: SELECT toStartOfWeek(day) AS time, team_id AS metric, sum(weekend_latest) / nullIf(sum(commits_latest), 0) AS value FROM ( SELECT day, ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned') AS team_id, argMax(weekend_commits_count, computed_at) AS weekend_latest, argMax(commits_count, computed_at) AS commits_latest FROM team_metrics_daily WHERE match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day, team_id ) GROUP BY time, team_id ORDER BY time
